amicablenumbersproject.View

Class GraphicalUserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • amicablenumbersproject.View.GraphicalUserInterface

  • public class GraphicalUserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Class is a View from MVC. It communicates with a user and take arguments from them. It also give back processed data.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Katarzyna Filus

      Enum is used for returning information what program option was chosen by the user.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseOption

        public GraphicalUserInterface.ProgramOptions chooseOption()
        Method is responisble for displaying options to choose for the user (modes of the app).
        Returns:
        1 when user wants to check if 2 numbers are amicable and 2 when they want to generate amicable numbers from an interval.

      • readnumber1

        public int readnumber1()
        It reads number1 from the user.
        Returns:
        number1

      • readnumber2

        public int readnumber2()
        It reads number2 from the user.
        Returns:
        number2

      • readEndpoint

        public int readEndpoint()
        It reads upper endpoint of the interval from which program generates amicable numbers.
        Returns:
        int value of the upper endpoint of the interval

      • writeAmicableNumbersResults

        public void writeAmicableNumbersResults(boolean areAmicable)
        It displays results in check mode. Result determines if numbers are amicable or not.
        Parameters:
        areAmicable - true if numbers are amicable, false when they are not.

      • writeAmicableNumbersGeneratedResults

        public void writeAmicableNumbersGeneratedResults(java.util.List<AmicableNumbers> amicableNumbersList)
        It displays results in generate mode. View displays the list of the amicable numbers from the chosen interval.
        Parameters:
        amicableNumbersList - list of amicable numbers generated

      • viewWarning

        public void viewWarning(java.lang.String message)
        It views information about incorrect data given by the user (for example letters instead of numbers or negative numbers).
        Parameters:
        message - - message that is shown as a warning.
